memberdef.name: SET_FRAME_PIXEL
memberdef.initializer: { \ isize index = bufferoffset + pixel; \ COLORIZE(index, color); \ zBuffer[index] = DEPTH_BORDER; }

memberdef.name: SET_FG_PIXEL
memberdef.initializer: { \ isize index = bufferoffset + pixel; \ COLORIZE(index,color) \ zBuffer[index] = DEPTH_FG; }

memberdef.name: SET_BG_PIXEL
memberdef.initializer: { \ isize index = bufferoffset + pixel; \ COLORIZE(index,color) \ zBuffer[index] = DEPTH_BG; }

memberdef.name: SET_SPRITE_PIXEL
